messages.title: Andy's Priorities
messages.content: I am standing in this election because I want: to protect our wonderful area and prevent it from being covered by endless executive houses built for private profit rather than public need. to save our High Streets by reducing rates for small traders and taxing fairly online traders like Amazon. to re-open the Skipton to Colne rail line and to restore Ripon's rail link. We need to provide efficient local train and bus services not a clumsy mess of different competing companies and vanity projects. to invest in modern northern industries and to get our region at the forefront of the upcoming wave of fresh new low carbon businesses. to protect local people, local businesses, and local farmers from a post Brexit trade deal with Donald Trump.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prevent it from being covered by endless executive houses built for private profit rather than public need.
Reduce rates for small traders and tax fairly online traders like Amazon.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Re-open Skipton to Colne Rail Line
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore Ripon's rail link and provide efficient local train and bus services.
Get our region at the forefront of the upcoming wave of fresh new low carbon businesses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect Local People From Brexit Trade Deal
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect local businesses and farmers from a post Brexit trade deal with Donald Trump.

mentions.candidate: Vote Andy Brown here in Skipton and Ripon

issues.environment: To take bold climate action, protect our wonderful area
issues.transport: re-open the Skipton to Colne rail line, restore Ripon's rail link, provide efficient local train and bus services

community.content: Prevent it from being covered by endless executive houses built for private profit rather than public need.

endorsements.endorsement: This general election isn't just about Brexit - this is about the country we live in. Our politics is broken and has failed to fix the intolerable inequality and insecurity which fuelled Brexit. On 12th December, tell the establishment it's time for change. Vote Andy Brown here in Skipton and Ripon

Our politics is broken and has failed to fix the intolerable inequality and insecurity which fuelled Brexit. On 12th December, tell the establishment it's time for change. Vote Andy Brown here in Skipton and Ripon

to protect local people, local businesses, and local farmers from a post Brexit trade deal with Donald Trump.

Caroline Lucas MP: This general election isn't just about Brexit - this is about the country we live in. Our politics is broken and has failed to fix the intolerable inequality and insecurity which fuelled Brexit. On 12th December, tell the establishment it's time for change. Vote Andy Brown here in Skipton and Ripon
